block.p: Michael W. Mitchell of New York and Brooke Mitchell of Scarsdale, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Katherine Brooke Mitchell to Andrew Davis Constan, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel D. Constan of Dayton, Ohio. A June wedding is planned.

Miss Mitchell, 24 years old, graduated magna cum laude from Brown University, where she was a member of Phi Beta Kappa. She is a student at Columbia University Law School. Her father is a partner in the New York law firm of Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom. Her mother is an artist.

Mr. Constan, 26, graduated from the University of Pennsylvania. He is a vice president of Salomon Brothers, the New York investment banking firm. His mother, Phyllis Constan, is lower-school principal of the Miami Valley School in Dayton. His father is the president and chief executive of DAP Inc., a Dayton building and construction materials manufacturer.
